label: Toxicity Filter
description: Filter compounds based on SMILES data and physicochemical thresholds.

defaultInputs.name: Input Compounds
defaultInputs.tooltip: Table of compounds including at least a SMILES column and basic properties.

defaultOutputs.name: SMILES
defaultOutputs.tooltip: SMILES string representing the compound's chemical structure.

defaultOutputs.name: Skin Irritation
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Predicted level of skin irritation (e.g. Very low, Low, Moderate, High).

defaultOutputs.name: Sensitization
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Predicted potential to cause skin sensitization or allergy.

defaultOutputs.name: Ames Mutagenicity
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Predicted Ames test outcome (e.g. Negative or Positive mutagenicity).

defaultOutputs.name: Dermal Absorption
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Predicted extent of dermal absorption (e.g. Low, Moderate, High).

defaultOutputs.name: Status
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Overall toxicity decision for the compound (Pass, Conditional, or Fail).

configSchema.label: Model
configSchema.tooltip: Choose which ADMET prediction model to use.

configSchema.label: TPSA Range
configSchema.tooltip: Topological polar surface area (Å²) range (min - max).

configSchema.label: HBD Range
configSchema.tooltip: Number of hydrogen bond donors range (min - max).

configSchema.label: HBA Range
configSchema.tooltip: Number of hydrogen bond acceptors range (min - max).

configSchema.label: RotB Range
configSchema.tooltip: Number of rotatable bonds range (min - max).
